functions.fetchData: async (baseUrl, path = '', cheerio) => { let $; const sections = []; try { const response = await fetch(baseUrl + path); if (!response.ok) { // load response data to HTML parser if (response.status === 404) throw new Error('404, Page not found'); throw new Error(`Fetch error: ${response.status}`); } $ = cheerio.load(await response.text()); } catch { console.error('Fetch error : Homepage'); } if ($) { // 'top week' section const topWeekSection = $('div#owl-slider.owl-carousel') .first() .children('div.item') .map((index, element) => { return { title: $(element).find('div.slide-caption h3 a').attr('title'), author: '', image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).find('div.slide-caption h3 a').attr('href'), description: '', chapters: [], }; }) .get(); sections.push({ title: 'Top Week', books: topWeekSection, }); // 'latest updates' section const latestSection = $('div.panel-content-homepage') .first() .children('div.content-homepage-item') .map((index, element) => { return { title: $(element).find('div.content-homepage-item-right h3 a').attr('title'), author: $(element).find('div.content-homepage-item-right span.item-author').text(), image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).find('div.content-homepage-item-right h3 a').attr('href'), description: '', chapters: $(element) .find('p.item-chapter') .map((chapIndex, chapElement) => { return { title: $(chapElement).find('a').text(), url: $(chapElement).find('a').attr('href'), date: null, pages: [], }; }) .get(), }; }) .get(); sections.push({ title: 'Latest Updates', books: latestSection, }); // 'new mangas' section const newMangasSection = $('div.panel-newest-content') .first() .children('a') .map((index, element) => { return { title: '', author: '', image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).attr('href'), description: '', chapters: [], }; }) .get(); sections.push({ title: 'New Mangas', books: newMangasSection, }); } return sections; }
